Uses a makeshift urine-to-water filtration system to survive in harsh conditions.
Constructs and operates a complex urine-to-water filtration system incorporating a biological kidney to reclaim drinking water.
No hesitation or doubt shown when drinking the reclaimed water, indicating confidence in his invention.
Sets a booby-trap on his own barrels to protect his resources from rivals.
Expresses frustration and rivalry verbally but does not resort to direct aggression.

Uses binoculars to scout the horizon carefully, demonstrating vigilance and situational awareness.
Adjusts the rudder and trims the sail precisely in reaction to observed conditions, reflecting skilled seamanship.
Expresses frustration and mild surprise at a rival drifter appearing unexpectedly, indicating that he may not have anticipated competition despite obvious stakes.

Shouts threats aggressively via megaphone without apparent backup or strong defensive position, risking confrontation rather than opting for stealth or diplomacy.

Battle and successfully kills a large hammerhead shark threatening the boat.
